text: welcome to daily video vocabulary a dose
of daily new English phrases and words
brought to you by let's talk podcast
calm
hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 44 in today's
episode I have a new word for you
admonish let's find out what it means
and how you can use it in your daily
conversation admonish at some point a
time in your life your teacher or mother
may have scolded you for doing something
you shouldn't have it could be due to an
action which was not acceptable or
approved of admonish basically means to
scold or strongly warn someone it also
means to let someone know that you are
not happy with their actions for example
you often scold children for their bad
behavior it means you are admonishing
them when a college principal strictly
warns his students for their poor
attendance in the class he is actually
admonishing them so when you admonish
someone you are actually telling them
very seriously that they have done
something wrong or you are warning them
very sternly it's a mild but serious
scolding
as the word admonish indicates an action
off scolding or warning someone it is a
verb okay now that you know what
admonish means let's have a look at how
you can use it in your daily
conversation example one
shamone was admonished by her teacher
for cheating in her final exams example
two the driver was admonished by the
policeman for being drunk while driving
example three the manager admonished the
senior executive for being rude with the
client in the meeting example 4 Mary was
admonished by her mother after being
caught having alcohol as she is just
fourteen example five the bouncer
administer at the discotheque
example six the police officer not only
admonished Sam for his reckless driving
but also took away his driving license
example seven the manager decided to
quietly admonish the new joinee in
private rather than issue an official
warning for arriving late on his first
day example eight Shawn I admonished you
about eating the food from the trash can
yelled Shawn's mom I'm so sorry mommy
said Shawn example nine for so many
years the lighthouse has been admonished
seaman of the approaching danger example
ten some hasty decisions taken in life
can have an admonishing effect on your
future
